stories.text:
Hey HN

When looking to start up some sort of business or startup, one thing that comes up is to do a "feasibility analysis" before you invest heavily in making the business go: that is, how feasible is the business? how profitable could it be? how many people are looking for this type of product.. etc.

When I look on google for "SaaS feasibility analysis", I can see many results on conducting one yourself, but is there anyone that can do this as a service that I can pay for? Not only do I feel like I could easily fall victim of my own confirmation bias, but I also want to save a little bit of my own time, and be able to write down some ideas to send them off and a get a report that I can reflect upon later.

I've recently been reading "start small stay small" by Rob Walling, and he suggests at minimum doing some search terms and keyword analysis to see how often other people google for these type of things, and how you could show up on the web easier in a niche; there's software that can do this for you, or you can spreadsheet this up yourself. Many of the software items seem either abandonware or be wanting to tie in to an already running business..

Is setting some tracking analytics on a landing page and email lists the only way to do a feasibility analysis for SaaS ? is it possible to find a professional service that can really do a deep dive on the idea for me?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there professional SaaS feasibility analysis services?

stories.text:
My co-founder and I met while working for a company in the geospatial space. I was a product manager there, and he was an Ui/Ux designer. We worked closely on a number of projects during that time. We don't have any special connection, but we both love the design side of things.

Looking at the design space, we discovered that there are some major issues that people face when trying to find designers for their projects -

A significant amount of time is wasted searching on Upwork and Fiverr for a qualified designer. Most agencies screw their clients, and they are also expensive. Billable hours for design services are not justified, causing budgets to skyrocket in most cases.

As a result, we are launching - Design Point

Consider it the Netflix of Ui/Ux design.

A monthly / yearly subscription fee will be charged.

What will you receive?

Design requests are unlimited. Unlimited feedback modifications. An infinite number of team members. Unlimited number of products and brands. project prototypes. Includes all file sources. Stop or cancel at any time.

How it will work ?

Subscribe to a plan that meets your needs and submit as many design requests as you want. Receive design updates within 1-3 business days depending on complexity. Unlimited feedback changes until you are 200% happy. There is no limits!

Pricing ?

7 days trial pack - $40 Monthly - $199 Yearly - $2100

To Get Started---

You can reach out to us - gupil@designpoint.io

Schedule a meeting with us - https://calendly.com/design-point/introduction
stories.title: Our new startup – DAAS ( design as a service)
